name: Dungeon of Greyness - Spring Show Version
name_original: Dungeon of Greyness - Spring Show Version
description: Many have entered the mysterious Dungeon of Greyness, few have come out. As a traveler lost in the sprawl of the dungeon, you seek a way out. Fight your way through over six levels of combat scenarios, find power-ups, and meet the dungeon's strange inhabitants. By honing your skills in combat, you might be one of the few to make it out.
